channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: Podcast: My first ChatGPT app. 4 minutes.
item.source:markdown: Podcast: My first ChatGPT app. 4 minutes.

item.description: This startup's plan makes me nauseous. As if the big problem in AI is compensating rentiers for their supposed losses due to AI apps. The information that news reports on does not belong to anyone. Bill Gross already has enough money. Instead, maybe he should find innovative ways to give it away.
item.source:markdown: This startup's plan makes me nauseous. As if the big problem in AI is compensating rentiers for their supposed losses due to AI apps. The information that news reports on does not belong to anyone. Bill Gross already has enough money. Instead, maybe he should find innovative ways to give it away.

item.description: Google Recorder is the perfect voice memo app, and great for the informal kind of podcast I do. Hats off to whoever designed it. Well done.
item.source:markdown: Google Recorder is the perfect voice memo app, and great for the informal kind of podcast I do. Hats off to whoever designed it. Well done.

item.description: The blogging world as viewed through my blogroll is for some reason much more interesting after the launch of the Harris/Walz ticket yesterday. Probably my mind playing tricks, again. üòÄ

item.description: How could someone like Nicholas Carlini not have an RSS feed. I'll never find my way back to his site, that's why I wanted my software to do it for me. Too bad, no feed.
